Headline: Temporary Westbound #20 Madison Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted near Madison/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Hamlin, Washington, Pulaski, Madison, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Madison/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Experiencing Delays; between O'Hare and Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line service continue to run with major delays due to a police investigation at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line service continue to run with major delays due to a police investigation at Rosemont.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between O'Hare and Cumberland stations.

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound platform at O'Hare, Rosemont, and Cumberland stations.

Also, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
